title: Deezer-Stats
description: Deezer-Stats is a website where you can consult your current favorites artists, songs and albums listening on Deezer by rank. The website is dealing the Deezer api.

title: Efrei'vote
description: Efrei'vote is a web plateform which allows users to vote for the current political election. It's a school project realized by a team of 4 students.

title: Zweb
description: Zweb is my first web development project. This is a website thought for old people where families can upload videos and photos for their grandparents. The medias are automatically display as a slideshow if the user category account is an old person. They just have to go on the website to see the latest news of their families !

title: MangaZ
description: MangaZ is an applciation where you can read mangas. There is a various catalogue that listed many types of mangas.
